```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(fontawesome)
library(htmltools)
```

```{r icon_slides, include=FALSE}
# Insert Slide links with FA Icon
icon_slides <- function(url) {
   tagList(
       fa("file-powerpoint", fill = "maroon"), HTML("&nbsp;"),
       tags$a(href = url, "Slides")
   )
}
```
